medkit.name: Surface Medkit
medkit.usetext: You use the medkit to heal yourself.
medkit.description: An assortment of medical tools from the surface, used to heal minor injuries.

healing_mud.name: Healing Mud
healing_mud.usetext: You slather yourself in the healing mud...
healing_mud.description: This clay-like mud glistened with streaks of inseparable gold powder. Even when holding it you feel more healthy.
